verbose_text: To selectively visualize and manipulate mAL neurons, we adopted the Mosaic Analysis with a Repressible Cell Marker (MARCM) technique, in which fru specific GAL4 (expressed via fru NP21 -GAL4 in this study) is activated only in cells that stochastically lose a GAL4 repressing transgene GAL80 by chromosomal recombination in response to heat shock induced Flippase expression (via hs-FLP).
